text: re-designed the interface for Dora, an AI surgery assistant
led qualitative research for a Nordic fintech startup exploring trust in AI-driven banking
facilitated strategy workshops for a museum rethinking their digital presence
designed a speculative futures toolkit for a climate research institute
conducted 40+ user interviews for an accessibility-focused transit app
helped a sustainable fashion brand articulate their design philosophy
ran a research sprint on remote work culture for a distributed tech company
created service blueprints for a telemedicine platform during the early pandemic
taught a workshop on design research methods at a Copenhagen design school
spent three months embedded in a hospital studying patient wayfinding
wrote a 60-page strategic report on the future of public libraries
redesigned the onboarding experience for a meditation app
led a cross-cultural research project spanning Tokyo, Copenhagen, and SÃ£o Paulo
worked with an architecture firm on human-centered urban design research
prototyped experimental interfaces for an electronic music collective
joined a research expedition studying food systems in rural Japan
co-authored a paper on participatory design in healthcare settings
worked at Amass Restaurant in Copenhagen and interned at the MAD Symposium
traveled through Southeast Asia documenting street food culture
completed my thesis on the semiotics of everyday objects
